track.name: Thelonious
comments: You don't break new ground unless you break habits.
He always took risks. It's only way to discover what is possible in this life. He plays himself.
Try smoking a cigarette and play the piano at the same time... Only a Monk
a lot of love for this short track
London Louis - I was thinking the same -'how did I get here from Tom Waits radio!'  not complaining either tho - quite like a drop of jazz
Living in music ... for me not possible without Monk
Great track, though I am not quite sure how I got here from Django Reinhardt's radio! Perhaps "Django" the tune was the link. Anyway. not complaining.
Thelonious was more then a genius!
god was improvisating when he was making your brain
